bow: ve seen askreddit opinions on spanking and now want to hear actual mothers opinions were you spanked as child would you do you spank your child why or why not can only know how feel about my child and my reaction to spanking but as mothers feel you have more real idea of what you do when it comes spanking some people are all for it but they have met or even decided of they are having children my parents spanked only when necessary nonetheless it never made sense to me if were to hit someone for doing something *i* found bad *i* would get in trouble why then can my parents everytime got spanking felt that it was unjustified ie say bad word and you can physically punish me that makes no sense what do we do to people who break the law we put them in adult time out since having babies in my life see how easy it is to resort to slapping smacking spanking hell ve flicked my nephew cheek when he was biting his older brother felt seriously guilty afterwards have two women in my life that close to both are mothers momma is the mother to two she has physically punished her children since they could reach grab hair smack on the hand etc once when her oldest pushed me as he was running out of the room was an obstacle in the doorway he would apologize would stay in his room etc all because was in his way as he was running out devastated he could have sweets prior to dinner he ended up getting smacked at least times once for not going to his room once for coming out too early once for telling his mother no couple of times for not apologizing to me when prompted it was ridiculous and completely unnecessary momma is the mother of one anytime her child has done something punishable grabbed hair thrown toys slapped scratched screamed m2 is there picks her up talks to her explains what she did was wrong and why it was wrong it takes longer for this type of guidance to take effect sure but is instant gratification total issue in our society anyways it took couple of months for her to break the habit of hitting but m2 child has not hit anyone since the change took place m1 children constantly hit each other and her still ve decided what going to do when raise my children spanking will be last resort not proverbial but real last resort again sure what has been deemed nonviolent parenting takes longer to instill message into the child it has proven time and time again that it the choice for me no judgment on anyone who has differing views please do attack mine this is the best thought out response ve read completely agree with you thank you for this deleted was spanked twice as child and do think those two times did anything to affect me personally am not fan of spanking it would only be used as last resort maybe wo spank because kind of pacifist you got ta do what works for your family thank you going through this myself my sister just informed me how she spamming her son and it makes me so heart broken he the sweetest little boy my mom would smack us on the butt if we were mouthy or misbehaving but it was never an official over the knee pants down spanking as mom never have and never will do it think it really important to lead by example for your children you would assume want your children to hit others so why would you hit them kids do understand why you are hurting them if you ca keep your calm as parent why would you expect child to be calm and rational in return on side note always remembered my mom losing her temper and yelling or smacking our butts in negative light do remember ever learning any lessons that way except the stick when we were kids it looked like friggin 2x4 do think the spanking badly affected me know that would hit other people when was teenager but my boyfriend now husband made it very clear that he would tolerate it at all and so ve stopped completely now that said my mum has always told me that she had to spank me because was particularly difficult child she would tell me all these horrible things would do and so ve always grown up with this notion that was particularly difficult now that have child of my now not only do see her doing the exact same things but see lots of other kids her age doing those things as well and worse coming to the conclusion that it was that was particularly difficult it was that my mum could cope with me it never made sense to me to hit child it stops them in the moment sure but in the longer term the child just learns that hitting is an acceptable method of dealing with anger and frustration in particular at the moment my daughter is two and tries to hit me out of frustration my response to that can not be to hit her back so we are spanking family now and probably wo ever be we have naughty chair in the corner and just the mention of it is usually response to her bad behavior but just either pick her up and walk off or walk away from her and wait for her to catch up but anyway that my experience hated being spanked at the time but my mum had me convinced it was necessary because was difficult coming to find that that may not have been the case as far as can remember was never spanked do know for sure that was very well behaved child my parents were really great parents either but if ever did get in trouble my nonnie would give me some crazy chore no one in their right mind would do so that kept me in line do not plan on laying hand on my daughter ever do think hitting gets the proper message across was hit whenever hit my brother because was bigger stronger than him how do you like it and it only ever made me feel more angry and resentful because he was an absolute terrorist when we were kids and they would never interfere with his nonstop harassment of me until after was fed up and hit him because it was the only way to make
